website_summaries.verdict: A wet or dry shaver that works quickly.
pros: This wet-dry shaver charges quickly and gives a very close shave in little time
If you're in a hurry and need something straightforward, go with the Wahl Speed shave
cons: This shaver may struggle with thicker hair

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Long time Bruan user but Bruan is no longer what they once were. Most of this review is comparisons to my old Brauns. Very large in my hand. Quiet operation. Trimmer is VERY hard to raise and lower. The 2 LEDs are invisible in normal bathroom light. I have to cup them over the razor to see them. Very long operation on battery. I've yet to see the low battery light on. Easy to remove foil to clean
customer_reviews.author: MLS

customer_reviews.title: BATTERY INDICATIONS
customer_reviews.text: First razor returned as the battery lights did not work. Second razor retained although battery lights did not work. It's a chea.....inexpensive razor so I kept it. Just charge it after about five shaves as a habit as there is NO warning when the battery is low...it just stops. The blue and red lights look the same whether on or off. The blue is a little better when it is actually being charged. It's my second Wahl and my last. I have bought their most expensive and their most inexpensive over the years and both have been disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: BOSORT

customer_reviews.title: Works as anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Close shave and includes a trimmer. Tried lots of different styles, both foil and rotary, different brands. This one is not bad at all. Most of the Wahl shavers appear to be this way. I'm pretty convinced that Wahl is the best choice. Some of the much more costly shavers from other manufacturers do work just as well but lack the trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Nevada Geezer

customer_reviews.title: not as close a shave as my Panasonic but very close and with a better battery life
customer_reviews.text: Works well, holds its charge for a week plus after daily shaving, not as close a shave as my Panasonic but very close and with a better battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a great razor! After spending nearly as much for a ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a great razor! After spending nearly as much for a razor from a discount store that was far below par in performance, I am totally thrilled with the Wahl!!

customer_reviews.title: Wahl electric shaver for men.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and is much less expensive than the big brands names.

customer_reviews.title: Good and cheap

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD SHAVER
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for a friend replacing his Phillips Norelco shaver. He is very pleased. It gives a much closer shave and the clipper for sideburns is very easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: It works great for my sensitive skin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product

I do not recommend for purchase!

customer_reviews.title: good shaver - bad trimmer!
customer_reviews.text: The shaver works very well. However, the trimmer does not cut and pulls the hair instead. i called customer service and she said to put oil on the trimmer. This did not help very much. It still pulls and does not cut.
customer_reviews.author: Dragon Lady

customer_reviews.title: Finally a Electric Shaver that works!
customer_reviews.text: For the past several years, since my old norelco bit the dust, I've been looking for a replacement razor that shaved as well. Bought a new expensive Norelco and was extremely disappointed. It simply wouldn't shave. Bought a new expensive Braun and again was disappointed, as it's shave was even worse. Saw the Wahl and decided I had nothing to lose as the price was so reasonable compared to the others. To my utter surprise it gives a great shave quickly. Not one minute as advertised, but dang quick. I mean my whiskers were completely shaved smooth quickly, no fuss, no aggravation or drama. Just removed like the quality shavers of my past.
customer_reviews.author: D. K. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: I found it excellent. For my light beard
customer_reviews.text: I found it excellent. For my light beard, it shaves close and quick. I shave in less time than with two other shavers I've used. Only down side is razor burn. Suggest using something like Lectric Shave which will minimize that. I'm sure this will very with beard and skin.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Cavin

customer_reviews.title: ... and thought I would try Wahl's shaver since I like their trimmer
customer_reviews.text: I was in the market for a replace shaver and thought I would try Wahl's shaver since I like their trimmer. The trimmer is very solid and fits nicely in the had; unfortunately this item isn't as solid as the trimmer. The shaver feels a little "cheap" because of the plastic but it is still a good value and does a good job.
customer_reviews.author: P. Pinheiro

customer_reviews.title: Best electric shaver I ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: My 26 year old son is developmentally disabled and I'm in charge of shaving him. I used a rotary shaver on him for several years -- I'm a blade many myself -- but it was often unforgiving to his skin. I decided to change to a foil razor and this one was both highly rated and reasonably priced. It works like a charm and Adam's face is now freshly shaved daily without irritation. Works great wet or dry. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dave D.

customer_reviews.title: He says that the shave is perfect. It took about a week for the best ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it. He says that the shave is perfect. It took about a week for the best shave. I didn't know that the razor takes awhile to get to know his face and then perfection. Thank you for having it.

Even tried other outlets but it will not come on at all.

product_meta.title: Wahl Speed Shave, Rechargeable Lithium Ion Wet/Dry Waterproof Facial Hair Shaver With Speedflex Precision Foils #7061-500
product_meta.description: Fast, convenient and comfortable, dual foil rechargeable lithium ion waterproof shaver with popup precision ground trimmer best for shaving, trimming and wet or dry shave. Long lasting lithium ion technology go months between charges with regular use. Kit includes shaver, charger, storage travel zipper pouch, and styling guide.

COMPLETE HAIR CUTTING KITS OR SINGLE TOOLS: Whether you trim your hair between trips to the salon or barber, need beard or nose hair trimmers, or a complete hair cutting kit, Wahl has the high quality hair cutting and personal grooming tools you need

A SMOOTH CUT EVERY TIME: Wahl clippers & trimmers are available in a variety of styles to meet your home hair cutting needs. From Lithium Ion cordless & rechargeable clippers to heavy-duty corded models, Wahl clippers & trimmers deliver a high performance

THE BRAND USED BY PROFESSIONALS: Wahl clippers and trimmers have been used by professionals in the salon & barber industry since 1919. With self sharpening precision blades & quality construction, Wahl clippers, shavers & trimmers deliver a smooth shave
